core:messageResource.core:message: Void
An application error has occurred. Please contact your administrator.
No Items are available to void. Press OK to continue.
Void Cancelled. Press OK to continue.
Void of this item is not allowed. Press OK to continue.
The item entered was not found or cannot be voided.
The item entered has already been voided.
Void item failed. Press OK to continue.
One of the items cannot be voided.
One of the items cannot be voided. Press OK to enter authorisation.
One or more of the items must be voided individually before transaction void.
A Card Tender item must be voided individually before transaction void.
The last item cannot be voided individually. Do you wish to void the complete transaction.
Please enter the void {%=(empty(fieldValidatorName) ? 'reference number' : fieldValidatorName)}.
You are currently in the middle of a transaction. Press OK to void the complete transaction or Cancel to return to your basket.
The last item cannot be voided individually. Do you wish to void the complete transaction.
Void of tender is not allowed in this state
The user can void items
Void Item
Void Item Allowed
Item voids are allowed
Void Merchandise Items Allowed
The user can void merchandise items
Void Price Override Allowed
The user can void price overrides
Scanned Void Items Allowed
The user can authorise scanned voids
Void Transaction Allowed (Include Empty Transaction)
The user can void the whole transaction (including empty transaction)
Void Discount Allowed
The user can void an item discount
Void Transaction Discount Allowed
The user can void a transaction discount
Void Price Override
The user can void a price overrides
Void Card Tender Items Allowed
The user can void card tender items
Void Account Payment Items Allowed
The user can void account payment items
Void Gift Card Items Allowed
The user can void gift card items
Void Gift Card Tenders Allowed
The user can void gift card tenders
Void Non-Merchandise Items Allowed
The user can void non-merchandise items
Void Account Withdrawal Items Allowed
The user can void account withdrawal items
Authorises Void Item
The user can authorise item voids
Authorises Merchandise Item Voids
The user can authorise merchandise item voids
Authorises Void Price Override
The user can authorise voids of price overrides
Authorises Scanned Voids
The user can authorise scanned void items
Authorises Void Transaction (Include Empty Transaction)
The user can authorise transaction voids (including empty transaction)
Authorises Void Discount
The user can authorise voids of item discounts
Authorises Void Transaction Discount
The user can authorise voids of transaction discounts
Authorises Card Tender Item Voids
The user can authorise card tender item voids
Authorises Account Payment Item Voids
The user can authorise account payment item voids
Authorises Gift Card Item Voids
The user can authorise gift card item voids
Authorises Gift Card Tender Voids
The user can authorise gift card tender voids
Authorises Non-Merchandise Item Voids
The user can authorise non-merchandise item voids
Void Empty Transaction Allowed
The user can void empty transaction
Authorises Void Empty Transaction
The user can authorise void empty transaction
Override Non Voidable Item Allowed
The user can void transactions with non-voidable items
Authorises Override of Non Voidable Item
The user can authorise void transactions with non-voidable items
Authorises Account Withdrawal Item Voids
The user can authorise account withdrawal item voids
Void Tender Item Allowed
Tender item voids are allowed
Void Tender Item Always Allowed
Tender item voids are allowed in both Sale and Tender states
Authorises Void Tender Item
The user can authorise tender item voids
Exclude Tenders in Void Item
Tenders are excluded from the item selection list in void item
Skip Void Transaction Cancel Notification
Void transaction cancel notifications will not be shown for this user
